Author: Zyran
Message: Ehm

Author: Moderator
Message: Welcome Zyran.

Author: Moderator
Message: Thank you for participating in this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the next posts, I'll be going over the rules of the "game" you're about to play.

Author: Moderator
Message: Once I'll be done, I'll ask you if you've understood the rules, and if you haven't I'll explain them in different words.

Author: Moderator
Message: You're about to talk to Andrew. Andrew is a fictive character that has been completely created for the purpose of this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: You'll be talking to him twice.

Author: Moderator
Message: The only difference between the two conversations you'll have with him, is that in one of them Andrew will be played by a real human.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the other, it will be played by an Artificial Intelligence we are developing.

Author: Moderator
Message: We will call the Human and the Artificial Intelligence the Actors.

Author: Moderator
Message: The order in which you'll be talking to each Actor is random.

Author: Moderator
Message: You will not be talking twice with the same Actor.

Author: Moderator
Message: Both the Artificial Intelligence and the Human will try to portray the same Andrew in the most convincing way they can.

Author: Moderator
Message: Your goal is simple. After talking to the two actors, you'll have to guess which one was the Artificial Intelligence and which one was the Human.

Author: Moderator
Message: Whenever you have made your decision, you are able to stop the conversation.

Author: Moderator
Message: Each conversation will last for 15 minutes maximum if you do not decide to stop it before.

Author: Moderator
Message: Please, keep your posts to text only (No smileys, no links... etc)

Author: Moderator
Message: Do not type more than one post per answer.

Author: Moderator
Message: Do you understand the rules and what you have to do?

Author: Zyran
Message: I guess so.

Author: Moderator
Message: Good. Andrew will start the conversation. The 15 minutes will start after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: Zyran
Message: Yep

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: Zyran
Message: Hi

Author: Andrew
Message: How are you doing?

Author: Zyran
Message: I'm good :-) Who is supposed to be leading the conversation during this test? :-)

Author: Moderator
Message: [Please don't use smileys]

Author: Andrew
Message: Well, no one has to lead actually. We can just chat.

Author: Zyran
Message: Okay, then. And how are you doing?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm doing quite alright thanks! What about you?

Author: Zyran
Message: As I've said, I'm good.

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh yeah sorry I got distracted. What's up though?

Author: Zyran
Message: Nothing much, my brother sent this to me like 5 minutes ago. Guess I'm just killing my time here.

Author: Andrew
Message: Ah I see. You you play video games?

Author: Zyran
Message: I do, name me a few that you've played lately, if you do too .

Author: Andrew
Message: Lately I've been playing a lot of Mass Effect. I mostly play Minecraft.

Author: Zyran
Message: Yeah, I've already played through the whole new Mass Effect that just came out. I'm a videogame reviewer.

Author: Andrew
Message: What did you think about it? And that's quite cool.

Author: Zyran
Message: Not bad, not awesome. Gave it 7/10. Slighty above average.

Author: Andrew
Message: It's always hard to start a new series. I think it's not a bad start to a new trilogy to be honest.

Author: Zyran
Message: Yeah, the ending talked to me into giving it a 7. Otherwise, I'd just give it a 6. What time did we start this test, do you know?

Author: Andrew
Message: No I have no idea sorry. What did you like about the ending?

Author: Zyran
Message: The atmosphere. But let's change the subject. I wanna know if you're a bot or a human actually.

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm a human obviously.

Author: Zyran
Message: That's what a robot would say, as well.

Author: Andrew
Message: It would be dumb to say that I'm a bot though. But probably yes.

Author: Zyran
Message: Unless you were a human and you would want to confuse me. That way you would say that you are a bot.

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm supposed to convince you that I'm the human, not confuse you. Mind you the bot would say the same since we have the same goal.

Author: Moderator
Message: Time is up!

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to (This is not your final answer)

Author: Zyran
Message: Human

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright. We'll start the next conversation. Andrew will begin and then you'll have 15 minutes after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: Zyran
Message: Yes

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: Zyran
Message: Oh you again!

Author: Andrew
Message: I could say the same!

Author: Zyran
Message: And you can!

Author: Andrew
Message: How are you?

Author: Zyran
Message: Crap, ruined the joke... I'm doing alright, how about you?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm quite alright! What joke did you have planned though?

Author: Zyran
Message: Nevermind. So, if there are actual humans in this test. How many of actual real beings are there?

Author: Andrew
Message: Technically there's 3. You, me and the moderator.

Author: Zyran
Message: I know, but there obviously has to be a team of people. If one Andrew is supposed to be a real human, then there has to be a lot of people taking shifts for the real Andrew.

Author: Andrew
Message: Nope, I'm actually the only Andrew around. No replacements.

Author: Zyran
Message: And how many people are acting as the real Andrew? If we put aside our little conversation here, I'm just curious about the project.

Author: Andrew
Message: Well I just told you. I'm the only one.

Author: Zyran
Message: And if, for example, 5 other people would be taking the test and they just finished talking to the robot Andrew, they are supposed to wait in line for the real one?

Author: Andrew
Message: Yes. That's why we're only having one person at a time.

Author: Zyran
Message: Oh I didn't know that.

Author: Andrew
Message: Well now you do.

Author: Zyran
Message: How long are you doing this?

Author: Andrew
Message: Until we've got enough data. I'm not sure yet how long it will take.

Author: Zyran
Message: Is this well-knows, this project? Never heard of it.

Author: Andrew
Message: Wait what?

Author: Zyran
Message: Yeah, my brother sent this to me, but I've never heard of it before.

Author: Andrew
Message: Why would you have heard of it?

Author: Zyran
Message: So are you surprised I haven't heard of it or surprised that I thought I should have heard of it?

Author: Andrew
Message: No I misunderstood your first question. I now understand that you meant well known. And no it's not public, so there is no way you would have heard about it.

Author: Moderator
Message: Time is up!

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to in the first conversation?

Author: Zyran
Message: Robot

Author: Zyran
Message: wait

Author: Zyran
Message: First conversation - human

Author: Moderator
Message: On a scale from 1 (not sure at all) to 7 (certain), how confident are you of your answer?

Author: Zyran
Message: Can I remake my answer?

Author: Moderator
Message: Yes

Author: Zyran
Message: Human (first conversation)

Author: Moderator
Message: I understood that yes.

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright thank you for your participation! If you've given your e-mail, we'll send you some information about the results of this study in the coming months.

Author: Moderator
Message: If you have comments you'd like to share, feel free to do so now. Otherwise you can now close this window.

Author: Zyran
Message: When am I gonna know who was the robot ? In those coming months?

Author: Moderator
Message: You can know now if you have no comment, or after your comments.

Author: Zyran
Message: Ok, I'd like to know.

Author: Moderator
Message: The human was the second one.

Author: Zyran
Message: Wow

Author: Zyran
Message: Ok then, goodbye and good luck with the project

Author: Moderator
Message: Thank you very much! Good bye and good luck with yours.
